thread.title: Putin: Massive deadly fire was 'criminal negligence'

title: Putin: Massive deadly fire was 'criminal negligence'
text:
Putin: Massive deadly fire was 'criminal negligence' 5:33am EDT - 01:00 
Investigators looking into a Russian shopping mall blaze that killed at least 64 people say the fire exits at the building had been blocked and alarm system wasn't functioning properly, as President Vladimir Putin visits the area.   
Investigators looking into a Russian shopping mall blaze that killed at least 64 people say the fire exits at the building had been blocked and alarm system wasn't functioning properly, as President Vladimir Putin visits the area.  //reut.rs/2GwwuPz
